subject: Cannot login to my account
description: My password reset is not working and I am locked out of my account. I need to access my authentication settings.

subject: Application crashes on startup
description: The app keeps crashing with an error message. It is completely broken and not working at all. Very slow performance.

subject: Incorrect invoice amount
description: My billing statement shows the wrong charge. I need a refund for the extra payment on my subscription.

subject: Please add export feature
description: I have a feature request to add CSV export functionality. This enhancement would improve the integration capabilities.

subject: UI displays incorrect data
description: There is a bug where the dashboard shows missing information and incorrect values. I can reproduce this glitch every time.

subject: General question about the product
description: I was wondering about the general capabilities of your platform and how it compares to alternatives.

subject: URGENT: Production system down
description: This is an emergency! Our production system is completely down and we are experiencing critical data loss. We need help immediately asap.

subject: Minor cosmetic issue
description: There is a minor visual glitch with no rush to fix. Would be nice to have it fixed eventually when possible.
